# IRC Robotics Club Merchandise Website

## Project Overview
Next.js 14 website for IRC (Iter Robotics Club) merchandise launch with:
- Welcome/Hero section
- 3D t-shirt model reveal (placeholder for now, model integration later)
- Order form with name customization, size selection
- QR code payment display and screenshot upload
- Firebase integration (to be added later)

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- React Hook Form + Zod (form validation)

## Development Notes
- Phase 1: UI/UX frontend and form (current)
- Phase 2: Firebase backend integration
- Phase 3: 3D model integration with Three.js
